com.twitter.heron.api.metric

Interface IMetricsRegister

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TopologyContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetricsCollector, TopologyContextImpl

    public interface IMetricsRegister

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends IMetric<U>,U>
      T      		 registerMetric(java.lang.String name, T metric, int timeBucketSizeInSecs)
      Register an IMetric instance.

    • Method Detail

      • registerMetric

        <T extends IMetric<U>,U> T registerMetric(java.lang.String name,
                                          T metric,
                                          int timeBucketSizeInSecs)
        Register an IMetric instance. Heron will then call getValueAndReset on the metric every timeBucketSizeInSecs and the returned value is sent to all metrics consumers. You must call this during IBolt::prepare or ISpout::open.
        Returns:
        The IMetric argument unchanged.
